item.title: ARCL Organics Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: ARCL Organics Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Commodity Chemicals sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential deterioration in the stock’s trend and raises concerns about sustained bearish momentum in the near to medium term. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Mixed Results Across 4,085 Stocks in Dec-2025 Quarter
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has concluded for 4,085 stocks, revealing a nuanced landscape of corporate performance marked by modest improvement in positive results and distinct sectoral trends. While aggregate profit growth remains subdued, mid-cap companies continue to outperform their large- and small-cap counterparts, underscoring a divergence in market dynamics heading into 2026. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: Mid-Cap Segment Sees Modest Decline Amid Mixed Sectoral Performance on 20 Feb 2026
item.description: The mid-cap segment experienced a modest decline this week, with the BSE Midcap index slipping by 1.52% on 20 Feb 2026 and a marginal 0.08% drop over the last five days. Despite the overall subdued performance, select stocks and sectors demonstrated resilience, supported by recent technical upgrades and upcoming earnings announcements that could influence near-term momentum. Time: 2 hours ago
